title: 12 Best Makeup Setting Sprays on the Market
description: Every makeup routine needs a finishing touch that secures the whole look and pulls it together - that finishing touch is a setting spray. Whether you're dealing with sweat, heat, creasing, or oily skin, a good setting spray can help keep your makeup looking fresh for longer. "Priming sprays are a bit more skin-care-focused and offer more texture for a smooth surface," Allen Goldman, CEO of Skindinavia, says. "Finishing sprays are about a healthy, luminous look and extended wear." A makeup setting spray is the last step in your routine that helps give your complexion and base makeup a blended, flawless look while protecting and preserving it for long-lasting wear. Setting sprays use special polymers to seal your makeup in place, creating a breathable mesh on top. Investing in a quality setting spray made for your skin type and needs can be more effective in making your makeup last longer than a primer might. We rounded up the best setting sprays on the market. We found top-tier picks, including the product responsible for keeping Beyoncé looking fresh, the bestselling Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray, and others from brands like Morphe, Charlotte Tilbury, and more. Shop all of our top best makeup setting spray picks ahead.
author: Anvita Reddy
excerpt: We curated the best setting sprays for makeup for all skin types and needs including bestsellers from brands like Urban Decay, Morphe, and more.
text: Skip to main contentEm CosmeticsEm CosmeticsWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. Whether you're dealing with sweat, heat, creasing, or oily skin, a good setting spray can help keep your makeup looking fresh for longer. "Priming sprays are a bit more skin-care-focused and offer more texture for a smooth surface," Allen Goldman, CEO of Skindinavia, says. "Finishing sprays are about a healthy, luminous look and extended wear." A makeup setting spray is the last step in your routine that helps give your complexion and base makeup a blended, flawless look while protecting and preserving it for long-lasting wear. Setting sprays use special polymers to seal your makeup in place, creating a breathable mesh on top. Investing in a quality setting spray made for your skin type and needs can be more effective in making your makeup last longer than a primer might. We rounded up the best setting sprays on the market. We found top-tier picks, including the product responsible for keeping Beyoncé looking fresh, the bestselling Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray, and others from brands like Morphe, Charlotte Tilbury, and more. Shop all of our top best makeup setting spray picks ahead.sephora.comBest Aerosol Setting SprayOne/Size On 'Til Dawn Mattifying Waterproof Setting Spray ($32) Not only does this setting spray keep Beyoncé's makeup from coming off, but it's editor-approved as well. It's best for oily, combo, or normal skin, so we'd skip this one if you're super dry because it's mattifying. It's made with witch hazel for a blurring effect and green tea extract to minimize the appearance of pores. Read our full review. sephora.comBest Setting Spray OverallUrban Decay All Nighter Long-Lasting Makeup Setting Spray ($36) The Urban Decay All Nighter Long-Lasting Makeup Setting Spray is so good, it's practically magic. Its formula promises to lock down your look for up to 16 hours, meaning you can head to a sweaty rave or a sexy sleepover without fear of smudging a single bit of pigment.emcosmetics.comBest Blurring Setting SprayEm Cosmetics Divine Water ($38) If you're looking for a setting spray that will make your skin look like it has the TikTok retouch filter on it, this is the product for you. It's made with hyaluronic acid, peptides, and microbiome ferment, and will give your skin the most luminous glow ever. It can be spritzed on before and after makeup, and it has a very light milky orange blossom fragrance.ulta.comBest Transfer-Proof Setting SprayFlower Beauty Jet Set Invisible Powder Spray ($16) The Flower Beauty Jet Set Invisible Powder Spray is what you pick up when you want to be photo-ready for hours upon hours. It's made with a nongreasy, nonsticky formula that keeps makeup from fading for up to 16 hours. Read our full review. target.comBest Dewy Setting SprayNYX Professional Makeup Dewy Finish Setting Spray ($10) Lots of people grow dissatisfied with setting sprays because they are prone to soaking up excess moisture and oil. The NYX Professional Makeup Dewy Finish Setting Spray is ideal for those with dry complexions, as it keeps the skin hydrated but still keeps your makeup in place. It also contains powerhouse antiaging ingredient niacinamide, which fades discoloration and brightens uneven tone.target.comBest Affordable Setting SprayE.l.f. Makeup Mist & Set ($8) With ingredients like aloe, green tea, and vitamins A, C, and E, the E.l.f. Makeup Mist & Set was created to soothe and hydrate skin while keeping your makeup in place, though you can also use it ahead of applying product for smoother application.amazon.comBest Sweat-Proof Setting SpraySkindinavia The Makeup Finishing Spray Bridal ($29) Every bottle of the Skindinavia The Makeup Finishing Spray Bridal contains the brand's patented temperature-control technology, which reduces the heat of your makeup, preventing melt-off and fading. This one was developed specifically for brides and resists tears, sweating, and kissing, leaving makeup photo-ready for up to 16 hours.sephora.comBest Refreshing Setting SprayRare Beauty Always an Optimist 4-in-1 Mist ($27) The Rare Beauty Always an Optimist 4-in-1 Mist is a multitasker that primes, sets, hydrates, and gives your skin a dewy glow, all with help from one to two long-lasting spritzes.ulta.comBest Multitasking Setting SprayMAC Prep + Prime Fix ($34) If you love MAC, you will live for its MAC Prep + Prime Fix setting spray. Use it before and after makeup for the ultimate hydration vacation for your face. It's infused with vitamins, minerals, green tea, chamomile, and cucumber to balance out your skin. It'll make your makeup last until you want to take it off.ulta.comBest Setting Spray With SPFCoola Makeup Setting Sunscreen Spray SPF 30 ($36) The Coola Makeup Setting Sunscreen Spray SPF 30 not only keeps your makeup looking fresh all day but also gives you a built-in layer of sun protection while hydrating skin with hyaluronic acid. Use this throughout your day for a quick makeup refresh and as a way to reapply your sunscreen. SephoraAnvita Reddy (she/her) is an assistant editor for PS Shopping. She has a passion for products and reviews home gadgets, cookware, tech, and more. Having dealt with acne as a teenager and into adulthood, her expertise lies in beauty. She tests skin care, makeup, and hair care, plus countless other beauty products. Renee Rodriguez (she/her) is a staff writer and social producer for PS. She writes across all verticals, but her main areas of expertise focus on fashion and beauty content with an emphasis on reviews and editor experiments. She also produces social content for the PS TikTok and Instagram accounts.
html:
Skip to main content

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Every makeup routine needs a finishing touch that secures the whole look and pulls it together — that finishing touch is a setting spray. Whether you're dealing with sweat, heat, creasing, or oily skin, a good setting spray can help keep your makeup looking fresh for longer. "Priming sprays are a bit more skin-care-focused and offer more texture for a smooth surface," Allen Goldman, CEO of Skindinavia, says. "Finishing sprays are about a healthy, luminous look and extended wear."

A makeup setting spray is the last step in your routine that helps give your complexion and base makeup a blended, flawless look while protecting and preserving it for long-lasting wear. Setting sprays use special polymers to seal your makeup in place, creating a breathable mesh on top. Investing in a quality setting spray made for your skin type and needs can be more effective in making your makeup last longer than a primer might. We rounded up the best setting sprays on the market. We found top-tier picks, including the product responsible for keeping Beyoncé looking fresh, the bestselling Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray, and others from brands like Morphe, Charlotte Tilbury, and more. Shop all of our top best makeup setting spray picks ahead.

Best Aerosol Setting Spray

One/Size On 'Til Dawn Mattifying Waterproof Setting Spray ($32)

Not only does this setting spray keep Beyoncé's makeup from coming off, but it's editor-approved as well. It's best for oily, combo, or normal skin, so we'd skip this one if you're super dry because it's mattifying. It's made with witch hazel for a blurring effect and green tea extract to minimize the appearance of pores. Read our full review.

Best Setting Spray Overall

Urban Decay All Nighter Long-Lasting Makeup Setting Spray ($36)

The Urban Decay All Nighter Long-Lasting Makeup Setting Spray is so good, it's practically magic. Its formula promises to lock down your look for up to 16 hours, meaning you can head to a sweaty rave or a sexy sleepover without fear of smudging a single bit of pigment.

Best Blurring Setting Spray

Em Cosmetics Divine Water ($38)

If you're looking for a setting spray that will make your skin look like it has the TikTok retouch filter on it, this is the product for you. It's made with hyaluronic acid, peptides, and microbiome ferment, and will give your skin the most luminous glow ever. It can be spritzed on before and after makeup, and it has a very light milky orange blossom fragrance.

Best Transfer-Proof Setting Spray

Flower Beauty Jet Set Invisible Powder Spray ($16)

The Flower Beauty Jet Set Invisible Powder Spray is what you pick up when you want to be photo-ready for hours upon hours. It's made with a nongreasy, nonsticky formula that keeps makeup from fading for up to 16 hours. Read our full review.

Best Dewy Setting Spray

NYX Professional Makeup Dewy Finish Setting Spray ($10)

Lots of people grow dissatisfied with setting sprays because they are prone to soaking up excess moisture and oil. The NYX Professional Makeup Dewy Finish Setting Spray is ideal for those with dry complexions, as it keeps the skin hydrated but still keeps your makeup in place. It also contains powerhouse antiaging ingredient niacinamide, which fades discoloration and brightens uneven tone.

Best Affordable Setting Spray

E.l.f. Makeup Mist & Set ($8)

With ingredients like aloe, green tea, and vitamins A, C, and E, the E.l.f. Makeup Mist & Set was created to soothe and hydrate skin while keeping your makeup in place, though you can also use it ahead of applying product for smoother application.

Best Sweat-Proof Setting Spray

Skindinavia The Makeup Finishing Spray Bridal ($29)

Every bottle of the Skindinavia The Makeup Finishing Spray Bridal contains the brand's patented temperature-control technology, which reduces the heat of your makeup, preventing melt-off and fading. This one was developed specifically for brides and resists tears, sweating, and kissing, leaving makeup photo-ready for up to 16 hours.

Best Refreshing Setting Spray

Rare Beauty Always an Optimist 4-in-1 Mist ($27)

The Rare Beauty Always an Optimist 4-in-1 Mist is a multitasker that primes, sets, hydrates, and gives your skin a dewy glow, all with help from one to two long-lasting spritzes.

Best Multitasking Setting Spray

MAC Prep + Prime Fix ($34)

If you love MAC, you will live for its MAC Prep + Prime Fix setting spray. Use it before and after makeup for the ultimate hydration vacation for your face. It's infused with vitamins, minerals, green tea, chamomile, and cucumber to balance out your skin. It'll make your makeup last until you want to take it off.

Best Setting Spray With SPF

Coola Makeup Setting Sunscreen Spray SPF 30 ($36)

The Coola Makeup Setting Sunscreen Spray SPF 30 not only keeps your makeup looking fresh all day but also gives you a built-in layer of sun protection while hydrating skin with hyaluronic acid. Use this throughout your day for a quick makeup refresh and as a way to reapply your sunscreen.

Anvita Reddy (she/her) is an assistant editor for PS Shopping. She has a passion for products and reviews home gadgets, cookware, tech, and more. Having dealt with acne as a teenager and into adulthood, her expertise lies in beauty. She tests skin care, makeup, and hair care, plus countless other beauty products.

Renee Rodriguez (she/her) is a staff writer and social producer for PS. She writes across all verticals, but her main areas of expertise focus on fashion and beauty content with an emphasis on reviews and editor experiments. She also produces social content for the PS TikTok and Instagram accounts.
